answers.answer: For swelling they usually look for sudden swelling or excessive weight gain. I think it was an article on babycenter that was all about preeclampsia. That might be something you wanna look into. I'm sorry I can't help more. Good luck.
Ok thanku ima look that up rite now .. thanku again :)

I have preeclampsia ur main sign is elevated blood pressure 140/90, extra protein in your urine, swelling in hands and face, stressing about it is bad it can make it worse I'm 34 weeks I've been diagnosed since I was 30 weeks they will just monitor u closely if u do have and keep an eye on ur salt intake :) salt causes ur bp to rise

just left the hospital for this..... I don't have it but I had extreme swelling, throwing up, and major headache ...... she said its my diet...... got to drink a gallon of water daily.  so keep good water intake amd your diet sounds good so leave it at that and try to stay off your feet

question: Im so worried now ! Im 20 weeks n i have been noticing slight swelling in my feet n hands fingures and legs . I been havin these light headed feeling like ima just pass out witch is scary cus im usally home alone with my 3 yr old .. i have been feeling loss of breath wen laying dwn and even feel like im thirsty wen i just drank alot of water ... i thought mayb it my weight ..  Im not a skinny girl  im fairly packed with meat im 172 n have only gaind 2 pounds threw this pregnancy i watch wat i eat cus im scared to get really bigg so my meals are light as soups ,salads, no red meat , dairy i drink 2 percent milk n eat a cheese stick aday or subtitude it for a yogurt . Fruit i eat but not in big portians cus they have sugar n im scared to get diabites while pregnant so im starting to t hink can i have preeclamisa what are the symptoms what cuases it what can happen n how soon can i get checked up for this ..... i apoligize if i sound so dumb but im worried n paranoid that i can have somethin goin on with out me known ?
